== Ubuntu GNOME Meetings ==
Probably for the first time within Ubuntu Communities, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME | Ubuntu GNOME]]</nowiki> Team is pleased to use <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/+/learnmore/hangouts/onair.html | Google Hangout on Air]]</nowiki> for its <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/SubTeams | Sub-Teams']]</nowiki> Meetings instead of the classic known way (IRC Meetings).

=== Google Hangout on Air Meetings ===
Some advantages to have Google Hangout Meetings instead of IRC:
# Everyone around the world can watch, listen and learn.
# Get the best of the latest technologies.
# Give more popularity for Ubuntu GNOME system.
# We believe it is less confusing and faster than typing.
# More control over the meetings.
# Build a healthy and great relationship between team members and users.
# Visualize what Ubuntu GNOME Team is planning and doing.
# Sharing a youtube link on Social Media Networks, mailing list, etc is much easier and can spread itself much faster.
